body:
After this merge actionpack tests are going to fail ```ruby 1) Failure: test_auto_link(TextHelperTest) [/Users/arunagw/checkouts/rails/actionpack/test/template/text_helper_test.rb:361]: <"

Link http://www.rubyonrails.com

"> expected but was <"

Link http://www.rubyonrails.com

">. 2) Failure: test_auto_link_other_protocols(TextHelperTest) [/Users/arunagw/checkouts/rails/actionpack/test/template/text_helper_test.rb:454]: <"file:///home/username/RomeoAndJuliet.pdf"> expected but was <"file:///home/username/RomeoAndJuliet.pdf">. 3) Failure: test_auto_link_should_not_sanitize_input_when_sanitize_option_is_false(TextHelperTest) [/Users/arunagw/checkouts/rails/actionpack/test/template/text_helper_test.rb:443]: <"http://www.rubyonrails.com?id=1&num=2"> expected but was <"http://www.rubyonrails.com?id=1&num=2">. 4) Failure: test_auto_link_with_options_hash(TextHelperTest) [/Users/arunagw/checkouts/rails/actionpack/test/template/text_helper_test.rb:527]: <"Welcome to my new blog at http://www.myblog.com/. Please e-mail me at me@email.com."> expected to be == to <"Welcome to my new blog at http://www.myblog.com/. Please e-mail me at me@email.com.">. ```
